title: Engineering Degree in Computer Science
subtitle: From September 2021 to September 2024 at Polytech Lyon, France
content: During my time at Polytech Lyon, I was exposed to a diverse and rigorous curriculum covering a wide range of subjects, each contributing to my in-depth understanding of computer science and engineering.
Data Science

I explored advanced topics such as Big Data, with a particular focus on machine learning techniques.
Through hands-on projects and theoretical studies, I gained skills in analyzing large datasets and extracting meaningful insights to support decision-making processes.
Information Systems

I attended courses that provided valuable knowledge on the design and management of complex information systems in urban environments.
This involved understanding the integration of different technologies and data sources to support urban planning and development initiatives.
Project Management

I acquired essential skills to plan, execute, and monitor projects effectively from conception to completion.
This included project planning, risk management, and stakeholder communication.
Algorithms & Optimization

Courses in algorithms, graph theory, and discrete optimization provided me with a diverse toolkit of problem-solving techniques.
From developing efficient algorithms to modeling and solving complex optimization problems, these courses strengthened my analytical and critical thinking skills.
I also received specialized training in linear optimization techniques, enabling me to solve complex problems by finding good solutions without necessarily reaching the optimal one, using heuristics.
IoT
I programmed ESP boards, worked with sensors and motors, discovering the world of the Internet of Things and its practical applications.
Web Programming & Frameworks
I enhanced my skills in web programming and explored modern frameworks such as Spring Boot and React, allowing me to design robust and scalable applications.
Artificial Intelligence
I was introduced to AI, machine learning, and neural networks, gaining an initial understanding of the fundamental concepts of automatic learning.
Marketing
I contributed to the creation of an advertising campaign, which allowed me to connect my technical skills with communication and strategic challenges.
Soft Skills
I developed abilities in presentation and writing, essential for effectively conveying ideas and collaborating within a team.
Projects

Throughout my studies, I actively participated in group projects, where I had the opportunity to apply my knowledge and skills to real-world scenarios.
These projects often focused on emerging technologies such as mobile and web development, allowing me to gain practical experience in designing and implementing software solutions to meet specific needs.

title: Technical University Degree (DUT) in Computer Science
subtitle: From September 2019 to September 2021 at IUT Lyon 1, France
content: During my studies at IUT Informatique, I followed a comprehensive curriculum that provided me with a strong foundation in computer science and related disciplines.
Programming & Development

I gained experience with C, Java, and Python, explored Object-Oriented Programming, and developed skills in Web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also practiced Linux/Bash scripting for system administration.
Algorithms & Mathematics

Courses in Algorithms & Mathematics introduced me to algorithm design, graph theory (including Dijkstraâ€™s algorithm), sets, and statistics, which enhanced my analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Databases
In the area of Databases, I studied SQL, focusing on complex queries, table creation, and relational schema design, which strengthened my capacity to manage and structure data effectively.
Network & Systems
I learned about switches, routers, and key protocols such as HTTP, DNS, and ARP, while also acquiring skills in operating system configuration and management (Linux & Windows).
Management & Organisation

I developed knowledge in project management methodologies such as Agile and Waterfall, studied accounting fundamentals including income statements, and explored IT Law to understand the legal aspects of technology.
Languages & Communication
Courses in Languages & Communication allowed me to strengthen my English skills, improving my ability to communicate in professional contexts.
Projects

Throughout my studies, I actively participated in hands-on projects, applying theoretical knowledge to real-world scenarios. These experiences reinforced both my technical expertise and my organizational skills.
